entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sprague 2:00 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 45 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: E 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
